form.title: Test Title
form.langHint: Fill in at least the O'zbekcha (Latin) field. Other languages are optional.

delete.title: Delete Test
delete.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this test? This action cannot be undone.

empty.title: No tests found
empty.description: Generate your first test to get started

manual.noQuestionsFound: No questions found for selected topics
manual.noSelected: No questions selected yet. Select questions from the list below.

submitDialog.title: Submit Questions to Moderation
submitDialog.description: Submit the questions from this test for moderation review. Only DRAFT and REJECTED questions will be submitted.

preview.title: Test Preview
preview.question: Question
preview.confirmDesc: The test will be created with the shown questions.
preview.noQuestions: No questions found for these parameters

modeSwitchWarning.title: Switch Mode?
modeSwitchWarning.message: Switching mode will reset all form data. Any unsaved changes will be lost.

errors.noTopics: Please select at least one topic
errors.noQuestions: Not enough questions available for selected topics
errors.noActiveQuestions: No active questions found for selected topics. Questions must be in ACTIVE status.
errors.noActiveExplain: Questions go through: DRAFT -> Submit -> PENDING -> Moderator approves -> ACTIVE. Submit your questions for moderation first.

quickPromo.title: Quick Promo Code
quickPromo.description: Create an open assignment for this test and get a promo code. Students can enter the code to start the test.
quickPromo.shareHint: Share this code with your students

globalStatus.pendingAlert: This test is in the moderation queue. It will be visible to all users once approved.
globalStatus.approvedAlert: This test is globally approved! It is visible to all users.

submitGlobal.title: Submit Test to Global List
submitGlobal.description: Do you want to submit this test to the global tests list visible to all users?
submitGlobal.moderatorNote: The submitted test will be reviewed by a moderator. Once approved:
submitGlobal.benefit1: Visible to all teachers, students, admins and moderators
submitGlobal.benefit2: Students will be able to take the test directly
submitGlobal.benefit3: Shown in categories like DTM, SCHOOL, OLYMPIAD
